column4: Okay. I have what should be an easy task, but I can't figure it out right now. How do I create a "shortcut"/"link" on my desktop to a server that I own and regularly upload things to?
the firefox-bin is what you missed ;)
hmm dunno what that is, do ps aux | grep firefox, then kill all the resultant process IDs (except the one for the grep you just ran)
it does the second command if the first is successful, maybe the first failed
